introduction: Form element represents a document section containing interactive controls for submitting information.

most-important-tags.input: element is used to create an HTML form for user input

most-important-tags.textarea: tag defines a multi-line text input control

most-important-tags.select: element is used to create a drop-down list

most-important-tags.option: tag defines an option in a select list

most-important-tags.label: tag defines a label for several elements: input, select, textarea
